#Client_id = 'FD7K-_n3yg6PXn0C2mj3Og'
location = 'Syracuse, NY'
hotel = 'Hotels'
yelp_key = 'TZoMSq3xV2o_VJQn06gjlfqkTZay_mHWvr3ZYLa97mCwztxl7HGmf-gmGA_s6CRAtVrToVtzBPZFY3B8wr7IFmGrVlO3ysFa-odra7Etl62x3L9kfpOwmwY-83-cXnYx'
header = {'Authorization' : f'Bearer {yelp_key}'} 
url = 'https://api.yelp.com/v3/businesses/search'
params = { 'term' : hotel, 'location' : location}


response = requests.get(url, params = params, headers = header)
response = response.json()
response['businesses']
